subject: Return and Refund - Order SSN2154
description_text:
Hello,

I just received my Plus X pedals and noticed the throttle was not working
properly. After examining the load cell spring and its support more
closely, it was found that they were broken. I've attached images of this
issue.

I'd like to initiate a return and request a full refund for the entire
order. I do not wish to get a replacement.

Please let me know if you need any additional information from me.

Thank you,
Corey Supel

conversations.body_text: Hi Corey Supel,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Your pedal was probably assembled by one of our temporary workers, who installed the wrong gasket, causing it to touch the limiter. We will refund you $50 as compensation and reship a new accelerator pedal. We sincerely apologize!

Hi,

I am requesting a full refund and I’d like to return the entire order of
both pedals and baseplate. I do not want a replacement pedal - I wish to
return.

Thank you,
Corey Supel

Thank you

Corey Supel
